title: “The Best We Can” by Carrie Vaughn
description:
A scientist fights for the investigation of an unidentified object in space. "The Best We Can" appears in Carrie Vaughn's collection AMARYLLIS AND OTHER STORIES.


This episode is sponsored by Amazon Kindle (www.amazon.com/levarburton).
author: originals+lbr@stitcher.com (LeVar Burton and Stitcher)
